apstools

Landing page for the documentation of various releases.

Click here for documentation of the latest release.

Documentation versions

Starting with the 1.6.10 release, a new feature was added with the 1.6.10 release to the documentation that changes all the URLs for apstools. The feature provides access to documentation for selected previous tagged releases.

If you came to this page looking for the documentation, add /latest to the URL in the address bar such as these examples.

For example, the "Overview" page:

label URL comment(s)
version https://bcda-aps.github.io/apstools/overview.html
New location https://bcda-aps.github.io/apstools/latest/overview.html most recent tagged release
1.6.9 release https://bcda-aps.github.io/apstools/1.6.9/overview.html
1.6.8 release https://bcda-aps.github.io/apstools/1.6.8/overview.html
1.6.6 release https://bcda-aps.github.io/apstools/1.6.6/overview.html
unreleased https://bcda-aps.github.io/apstools/dev/overview.html development version (from main branch)

Select between different versions via a dropdown menu at the top/left of any page. But keep in mind the dropdown menu was only added after the 1.6.9 version so, earlier versions won't have it.
